quote_first: Spagnola took a deep breath and started into the log again. “
quote_last: : large dog craps in Dr. Yamata’s Aston Martin. Twelve oh-three: dog eats two, count ‘em, two of Mrs. Wittingham’s Siamese cats. She just lost her husband last week; this sort of put her over the edge. We had to call Dr. Yamata in off the putting green to give her a sedative. The personal-injury lawyer in the unit next to hers was home for lunch and he came over to help. He was talking class action then, and we didn’t even know who owned the dog yet."
title: Coyote Blue
author: Christopher Moore
